{{short description|Voice actor}}
'''James Kevin Ward''' ([[19 May|May 19]], [[1959]]) is an American voice actor and comedian

==Roles==
* [[2006]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'': Additional voices
* [[2004]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'': Additional voices
* [[2003]]: [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]]: [[Gandalf]], Additional voices 
* [[2002]]: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (video game)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (video game)]]: Additional voices
